org.neo4j.logging

Class FormattedLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.logging.AbstractLog
      • org.neo4j.logging.FormattedLog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Log

    public class FormattedLog
extends AbstractLog
    A Log implementation that applies a simple formatting to each log message.

    • Nested Class Summary

        Parameters:
        lock - the object to synchronize on
        Returns:
        a builder for a FormattedLog

        public static FormattedLog.Builder withLogLevel(FormattedLog.Level level)

        Parameters:
        level - the log level to use as a default
        Returns:
        a builder for a FormattedLog

      • toOutputStream

        public static FormattedLog toOutputStream(Supplier<OutputStream> outSupplier)
        Creates a FormattedLog instance that writes messages to OutputStreams obtained from the specified Supplier. The OutputStream is obtained from the Supplier before every log message is written.
        Parameters:
        outSupplier - A supplier for an output stream to write to
        Returns:
        A FormattedLog instance

      • bulk

        public void bulk(Consumer<Log> consumer)
        Description copied from interface: Log
        Used to temporarily log several messages in bulk. The implementation may choose to disable flushing, and may also block other operations until the bulk update is completed.
        Parameters:
        consumer - A consumer for the bulk Log
